title: Visual Analytics for Crime Investigation
description: Network analysis of 1M+ email records from the 2014 VAST Challenge to detect anomalies and identify hidden communication patterns for criminal investigation.

title: Cricket Sentiment Analysis
description: NLP-based sentiment analysis of 200K+ YouTube comments from India vs Pakistan cricket matches, identifying trends in fan excitement, controversy, and national pride.

title: Amazon Review Sentiment Analysis
description: Real-time sentiment analysis pipeline for 150K+ Amazon product reviews using Azure Data Factory and Apache Spark with 85% accuracy in sentiment classification.

title: Health Tales: Predicting Health Risks
description: AWS-based pipeline processing 991K+ health records to predict diabetes and cardiovascular risks with 72.1% accuracy using Random Forest algorithms.

title: Predicting Tech Sales Success (NPS)
description: Snowflake data warehouse analyzing 5K+ tech sales rep records to predict high Net Promoter Scores with 75% accuracy using Random Forest modeling.

title: House Price Analysis in Ames, Iowa
description: Analysis of 1,460 house sales using Apache Spark and SciPy, revealing homes with central air sell for 12% higher to assist real estate pricing strategies.

title: Real-Time Cryptocurrency ETL Pipeline
description: Built an end-to-end ETL pipeline that extracts and processes 1,500+ cryptocurrency price records daily via API, storing them in PostgreSQL for scalable analytics. Automated data ingestion using Apache Airflow, archiving 30+ MB of structured data per month in AWS S3, enabling historical trend analysis for crypto market insights.

title: AI-Powered Resume Screening & Job Matching
description: Developed an AI-driven resume screening system processing 500+ resumes and matching them to 100+ job descriptions using OpenAI GPT and vector embeddings in Pinecone. Built a FastAPI-powered backend with a Streamlit recruiter dashboard, reducing manual screening time by 60%, and automated resume ingestion via AWS Lambda for real-time processing.

title: Customer Churn Prediction Pipeline
description: Built a real-time customer churn prediction pipeline, streaming 10,000+ transactions daily via Apache Kafka into Snowflake and processing 500+ customer records per batch. Trained a Random Forest classifier with 78% accuracy, identifying high-risk churn customers, and visualized insights in Tableau, enabling targeted retention strategies.

title: Customer Segmentation & Sales Forecasting
description: Implemented K-Means clustering to segment 5,000+ customers based on purchase behavior, improving targeted marketing and personalized recommendations. Developed a Prophet-based forecasting model predicting monthly sales trends with 85% accuracy, analyzing 100,000+ transaction records, and automated workflow execution with Apache Airflow.
